item.title: First Article
item.description: first article. math is $X^\top X = I$. Define $$ AX = b. $$

item.title: How to Use
item.description: hugo はインストール済みであると仮定して話を進める． hugo new site <the name of site> git init git submodule add https://github.com/MeiK2333/github-style.git themes/github-style cp -r ./themes/github-style/layouts/* ./layouts/ cp -r themes/github-style/static/* static/ hugo new post/first-article.md edit config.toml hugo オプション activate KaTeX (Ref: https://blog.atusy.net/2019/05/09/katex-in-hugo/)
